OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLia.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLia.description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLia.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Financial Liability, Fair Value Option, after Tax and Reclassification Adjustment
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossFinancialLia.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Recognized in Earnings, before Tax
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in earnings.

OtherUnderwritingExpense.label: Other Underwriting Expense
OtherUnderwritingExpense.description: Costs incurred during the period, such as those relating to general administration and policy maintenance that do not vary with and are not primarily related to the acquisition or renewal of insurance contracts.

PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid
PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Direct
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.description: Amount, before effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.label: SEC Schedule, 12-17, Insurance Companies, Reinsurance, Premium, Percentage Assumed to Net
PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.description: Percentage of assumed premium earned to premium earned after effects of reinsurance, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information.

PremiumsWrittenNet.label: Premiums Written, Net
PremiumsWrittenNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

PrepaidReinsurancePremiums.label: Prepaid Reinsurance Premiums
PrepaidReinsurancePremiums.description: The unexpired portion of premiums ceded on policies in force as of the balance sheet date.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Bank Overdrafts
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, Net of Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed.

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Ceded
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

ReinsurancePayable.label: Reinsurance Payable
ReinsurancePayable.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the known and estimated amounts owed to insurers under reinsurance treaties or other arrangements.

ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLossesAllow.label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Paid Losses, Allowance
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLossesAllow.description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesAll.label: Reinsurance Recoverables on Unpaid Losses, Allowance
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesAll.description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained.label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Amount Retained
ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained.description: Stated amount that is the upper retention limit per entity policy.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsFinan.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Proceeds, Financing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsFinan.description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsCumulativ.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Cumulative Paid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsCumulativ.description: Amount, after reinsurance, of paid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Eight
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the eighth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Five
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the fifth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Four
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the fourth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Nine
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the ninth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year One
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the first year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Seven
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the seventh year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Six
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the sixth year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Three
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the third year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Historical Claims Duration, Year Two
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsHistorica.description: Percentage of average annual payout, after reinsurance, in the second year after a claim is incurred, beginning with the earliest accident year disclosed for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsIncurredC.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Incurred Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsIncurredC.description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of incurred claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net, Not Separately Presented
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts for accident years not separately presented in claim development information. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

StateInsuranceDepartmentStatutoryToNAICA.label: State Insurance Department, Statutory to NAIC, Amount of Reconciling Item
StateInsuranceDepartmentStatutoryToNAICA.description: Amount of an item which resulted in a difference from applying state prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices rather than statutory accounting practices prescribed by National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus Required
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: Amount of statutory capital required to be maintained as of the balance sheet date under prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StatutoryCapitalAndSurplusApplyingNation.label: Statutory Capital and Surplus Applying National Association of Insurance Commissioners (NAIC) Practices
StatutoryCapitalAndSurplusApplyingNation.description: Amount of statutory capital and surplus computed using statutory accounting practices prescribed by the National Association of Insurance Commissioners.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Aggregate value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value of forfeited shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of amortization expense on deferred policy acquisition cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Current Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost related to property-casualty insurance policy written.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Earned Premium
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of premium revenue earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Net Investment Income
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of net investment income earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Paid Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of loss reported and paid for claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Premium Written
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of premium written by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Prior Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred in prior reporting periods and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Reserve for Unpaid Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of reserve, policy claim payable and loss expense incurred by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Unearned Premium
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of premium written but not yet earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.description: Amount of amortization of deferred policy acquisition cost recognized, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferre.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Loss, Claim and Loss Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Operating Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.description: Amount of operating expense classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Revenue
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount of premium revenue earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Written
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount, after premiums ceded and assumed, of premium written, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Unearned Premium
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Tangible Asset Impairment Charges
TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnearnedESOPShares.label: Unearned ESOP Shares
UnearnedESOPShares.description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

UnearnedPremiums.label: Unearned Premiums
UnearnedPremiums.description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Securities
UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AccountsAndFinancingReceivableAllowanceF.label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsAndFinancingReceivableAllowanceF.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss of accounts and financing receivables. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

LongtermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Long-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time
LongtermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesDividendsPai.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Dividends Paid with Approval of Regulatory Agency
StatutoryAccountingPracticesDividendsPai.description: Amount of dividends paid subject to regulatory approval.

DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedGain.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Gain
DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedGain.description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Loss
DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedLoss.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.description: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Losses on Available-for-Sale Securities, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on available-for-sale securities.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Match
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage employer matches of the employee's percentage contribution matched.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments without Regulatory Approval
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Discount Deducted from Reserve
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of discount deducted from reserve for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.
